about_the_game:
Echoes of Extinction is an online multiplayer survival game set in a unique prehistoric world. This game blends horror elements with a tribal human civilization, set on an island where dinosaurs and humans compete for supremacy. Players can choose to play as either a human or a dinosaur, each offering a distinct gameplay experience.



Humans in the game must navigate a challenging world, engaging in activities like hunting, crafting, farming, and building. They must also form alliances and strategize in raids for resources. Tribal dynamics add an additional layer of complexity, as players must manage their relationships within their group and with other tribes.



On the other side, playing as a dinosaur provides a completely different perspective. Players start as hatchlings, learning to survive in a dangerous world. Each dinosaur species has unique abilities and challenges, including specific dietary needs and environmental adaptations. Dinosaurs must manage their territory, engage in mating rituals, and defend against threats from other dinosaurs and humans.



The game's dynamic ecosystem, coupled with changing weather conditions and natural disasters, significantly impacts gameplay and strategy. Players’ decisions have long-lasting effects on the environment and their survival. "Echoes of Extinction" promises a rich, immersive experience, where players can truly shape their journey in this prehistoric landscape.

This game blends horror elements with a tribal human civilization, set on an island where dinosaurs and humans compete for supremacy. Players can choose to play as either a human or a dinosaur, each offering a distinct gameplay experience.

On the other side, playing as a dinosaur provides a completely different perspective. Players start as hatchlings, learning to survive in a dangerous world. Each dinosaur species has unique abilities and challenges, including specific dietary needs and environmental adaptations. Dinosaurs must manage their territory, engage in mating rituals, and defend against threats from other dinosaurs and humans.

name: Echoes of Extinction

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X, Intel Core i7-6800K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT, NVIDIA GeForce 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X, Intel i5-10600K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6800, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Open World Prehistoric Horror Survival set on a mysterious island inhabited by dinosaurs and tribal humans. Survival is a test of resilience and adaptability. Players must carve their path in this challenging world, competing for territory, resources and ultimately, their own survival.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Danish
*languages with full audio support
